bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Alternative Names zang nüe 臟瘧 , depot malaria. Pathological Condition Combined Designation of xin nüe 心瘧 , “heart malaria”, gan nüe 肝瘧 , liver malaria; pi nüe 脾瘧 , spleen malaria; fei nüe 肺瘧 , lung malaria; shen nüe 腎瘧 , kidney malaria. Wai tai mi yao 外台秘要 5: 療五臟瘧及一切諸瘧法，灸尺澤七壯 , “Method to cure the five types of depot malaria and all other types of malaria: cauterize the chi ze [insertion point] severn times”.
